name: Who Shot Jessica Awesome
description:
NOTE: This game requires the RTP for RPG Maker VX Ace, it can be found here, at http://www.rpgmakerweb.com/download/additional/run-time-packages

## High walls, blood on the dance floor and a whole slew of murders at a party that just goes to hell. Who Shot Jessica Awesome is an Episodic-tale about TJ and his crew uncovering a mystery lurking behind the death of Jessica Awesome.

Play as TJ, a streamer called Awesomnesscity on Twitch faces his worst nightmare at a party where everything goes wrong, his wife gets shot. Meet some familiar faces, well, maybe.

- An exciting story!

- Completely free!

- An easy to learn battle system with different features.

- A good interface!

- Lots of easter eggs and references to other games!

- Coming soon, GameJolt support and missions and minigames!

## Tee-Jay's Story

Prologue - Overload (COMPLETE)

Episode 1 - Double Trouble

Episode 2 - (Hasn't Been Planned)

Episode 3 - (Hasn't Been Planned)

Episode 4 - (Hasn't Been Planned)

Episode 5 - Who Shot Jessica Awesome?

Epilogue - Limbo

## Catilyn's Story

Episode 1 - (TBC)

Episode 2 - (TBC)

Epilogue - Midnight

Come on, you know you have to solve this murder.

You have no choice do you?
